definition: to act as go-between (between prospective marriage partners etc)

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
medium/intermediary/matchmaker/go-between/abbr. for 媒體|媒体[mei2 ti3], media, esp. news media

sentences.english: A solution called a mordant is used in the dyeing process.
sentences.chinese: 一种叫做媒染的方法被用在染色过程中。

sentences.english: The world in general, and friends and buds in particular, all try to be a matchmaker for the single man.
sentences.chinese: 全社会，尤其是朋友和伙伴，都乐意为单身男性做媒。

sentences.english: The world in general and single friends and buds in particular all try to be a matchmaker for the single man.
sentences.chinese: 全社会，尤其是朋友和伙伴，都乐意为单身男性做媒。

sentences.english: But matchmaking is a tricky business.
sentences.chinese: 但是，做媒需要一定的技巧。

sentences.english: Liu Tung-fang had once asked Mrs. Wang to act as matchmaker for his sister.
sentences.chinese: 刘东方有一次托汪太太为妹妹做媒。

sentences.english: Apparently, there's often a little finagling to help matchmaking along, as well.
sentences.chinese: 显然地，这倒不如是帮助做媒的小把戏。

sentences.english: The world in general, and friends and 6)buds in particular, all try to be a matchmaker for the single man.
sentences.chinese: 全社会，尤其是朋友和伙伴，都乐意为单身男性做媒。

sentences.english: Therefore, in an effort to help their children out, parents are trying to be matchmakers6.
sentences.chinese: 因此，为了帮他们的孩子一把，父母们正试着做媒人。

definition: to act as go-between (between prospective marriage partners etc)
to pull strings/to manipulate (a puppet)/to control from behind the scene/to mediate
to bring together/to mediate/to arrange a deal
to betroth a girl (in arranged marriages)
variant of 定親|定亲[ding4 qin1]
to remarry (of a widow)/second wife/qin and se 琴瑟[qin2 se4], two string instruments as a symbol of marital harmony
to take a wife/to get married (man)
parents of one's daughter-in-law or son-in-law/relatives by marriage
